extendedInfo.description: Droidsheet is a Spreadsheet application that includes its own built in File Manager and Macro Programming. The Macro Programming Language is based around a dialect of BASIC and comes complete with 10 data types (BOOLEAN, BYTE, SHORT, INTEGER, LONG, FLOAT, DOUBLE, COMPLEX, STRING and VARIANT), mathematical functions, date and time functions, spreadsheet cell access functions, string handling functions, type checking functions and type conversion functions. It also includes a Help System that describes how the application is used.Spreadsheet Functionalityo Macro Programming based on a dialect of the BASIC language.o Insert Rows, Columns and Cells (Shift Down or Shift Right)o Delete Rows, Columns and Cells (Shift Up or Shift Left)o Cell Formatting (Change Locale, Number Format, Typeface, Text Size, Font Effects, Text Alignment, Text Color and Cell Background Color).o Adjust Column Width and Row Heighto Copy and Paste Cells, Lines and Columns (Individual or Blocks)o Mathematical Operators (+ - * /)o Relational Operators (= <> < <= > >=)o Mathematical Functions (ABS, ACOS, ACOSD, ASIN, ASIND, ATAN, ATAND, COS, COSD, EXP, EXP10, LOG, LOG10, POW, SIN, SIND, SQRT, TAN and TAND)o Logical Functions (AND, NOT, OR)o Selection Functions (IF, HLOOKUP, VLOOKUP)o Text Functions (CONCATENATE, LEFT, LEN, MID, RIGHT)o Statistical Functions (AVERAGE, COUNT, COUNTBLANK, MAX, MIN, SUM)File Manager Functionalityo Create New Spreadsheet (via Menu Key)o Open Spreadsheet (Short Touch of Spreadsheet Name)o Duplicate Spreadsheet (via Menu following Long Touch on Spreadsheet Name)o Rename Spreadsheet  (via Menu following Long Touch on Spreadsheet Name)o Copy Spreadsheet  (via Menu following Long Touch on Spreadsheet Name)o Cut Spreadsheet  (via Menu following Long Touch on Spreadsheet Name)o Paste Spreadsheet (via Menu following Copy / Cut Operation)o Delete Spreadsheet  (via Menu following Long Touch on Spreadsheet Name)o Folders Navigation (Short Touch on Folder Name)o Create Folders (via Menu Key)o Rename Folder (via Menu following Long Touch on Folder Name)o Cut Folder (via Menu following Long Touch on Folder Name)o Paste Folder (via Menu Key following Copy / Cut Operation)o Delete Folder (via Menu following Long Touch on Folder Name)Note: The Macro Programming Language is size restricted in both the Lite and Free Version.If you have any queries about this application, find any bugs or would like additional features added then please Email me directly using the link provided on this page.

reviews.title: Good, BUT!
reviews.comment: FREE version went from allowing custom cell functioning to NOT ALLOWING CELL CUSTOM FUNCTIONING.... Grrrr
reviews.author: Brendan Falconer

reviews.comment: I must be missing something. Hate it.
reviews.author: Dean Pridemore

reviews.title: Is there any way to share the spreadsheet?
reviews.comment: Love it! Simple and easy to use. But i want to share the spreadsheet for others. Please make an option to share via email. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor programming
reviews.comment: The cells are so small that navigating the sheet is very difficult. The help system isn\'t just broken, it doesn\'t work at all. The files are saved to an unknown location on the phone. And there is no method of uninstalling the data files the application creates. I do NOT recommend. DO NOT INSTALL.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good idea poor follow thru
reviews.comment: Auto save had 30 copies of the same spread sheet, not very ready to input into the cells, icons for the short cuts are not very clear, guess I am just use to the excel format. Uninstalled
reviews.author: Aaron Balentine

reviews.title: Not User Friendly
reviews.comment: I liked the looks of this spreadsheet app but, after downloading and trying to setup a spreadsheet of my own, I discovered the it was all fluff with a lot of buttons but no way to create your own setup, formulas and headers.  I tried editing one or more of the examples and discovered that you could not edit it to formulate a custom sheet.  Finally, I deleted the application.
reviews.author: Jim Shannon

reviews.title: Doesn\'t do much
reviews.comment: ... so yea, I know it\'s free, but umm
